[DQR.IFRS.0102.9544] Increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents before effect of exchange rate changes with a value of -2,881,916 is not equal to the combined total of Cash flows from (used in) operating activities, Cash flows from (used in) investing activities and Cash flows from (used in) financing activities ( -3,424,533 + 924,119 + 381,502 ) with a value of -2,118,912.
These values should be equal. [DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. abz_tn:CostsLossesgains, abz_tn:FinanceCosts All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Cash Flow Statement includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities of 381,502 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 2,183,617. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities that should add to 381,502 are comprised of the following:
- InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities 33,810 - PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares -1,282,559 + ProceedsFromBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities 34,323 + ProceedsFromIssuingShares 900,545
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for Cash Flow Statement. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities Total Value : 381,502 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : 0 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300JNP3LA8FWLU630/2021-12-31/ESEF/PT/0/009560-2021-12-31.zip/009560-2021-12-31/reports/009560-2021-12-31.xhtml 15840
